Sunday School teachers and men in positions of trust have accepted the truth as a result of the camp meeting. One man has been baptized who has been a signalman on the railway for twenty years and always gave perfect satisfaction. He has a family of eight boys and one girl. This brother has lost his position but others who have accepted the truth have been allowed 


                                   -135- 

to retain their situations and keep the Sabbath. Many interesting cases have come to our notice, and still the work goes forward.
